original_text:
For the inhabitants of Maroth
    wait anxiously for good,
because disaster has come down from the Lord
    to the gate of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 마롯 주민이 근심 중에 복을 바라니 이는 재앙이 여호와께로 말미암아 예루살렘 성문에 임함이니라

sentences.original_text: For the inhabitants of Maroth wait anxiously for good
sentences.korean_translation: 대저 마롯 주민들은 좋은 것을 초조하게 기다리니

sentences.original_text: because disaster has come down from the Lord
